getShortcutByName

public static Shortcut getShortcutByName(java.lang.String aUserLogin,
                                         java.lang.String aPrefix,
                                         java.lang.String aShortcutName)
                                  throws DatabaseException
This method tries to resolve the shortcut name in the following manner: - Looks up in the user config - Interpret the shortcut name as USER:Shortcut and resolve from the corresponding user's configuration - Interpret the shortcut name as BA:Shortcut and resolve from the current BA's configuration. - Finally check the shortcutName as in the BA's configuration.

Parameters:
aUserLogin -
aPrefix -
aShortcutName -
Returns:
Throws:
DatabaseException

                                               java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,Shortcut> bList)
This method returns the the list of shortcuts user.

Parameters:
scTable - Table of shortcut names and shortcut objects.
Returns:
List of shortcuts.
